title: Black Mailing Me Over Nothing
body:
okay so a few months back i made a deal with one of who i thought was a good friend in a nexus seige game the 2nd night of it being out that if i got a lvl 7 token on jinx i would gift him a udyr skin but only if i got the token ( i found out you cant get tokens on it now btw thanks riot) so i didnt get a token so i said no token shared screens in a  skype call and he saw that i didnt have a single lvl 7 token he even said and i quote " well that sucks" but now  over the last two weeks people from his club have been adding me and black mailing me 
[5:36PM] _name removed_: u gonna gift  _name removed_ yet
he emailed riot and they said u could get temp banned for false gifting
or somting
[5:44PM] im a teemo : what 
[5:44PM]  _name removed_: u could get banned if u dont gift wolf
[5:44PM] im a teemo : he nevr gifted me tho so he has nothing to get me banned for

so this kinda stuff and its just the fact that he is low enough to get others to do his dirty work for him which really pisses me off 

If a rioter could give me some feedback on what to do it would be much thanked

Long live the Jinx main {{champion:222}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
check the [universal rules ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) in regards to the naming and shaming policy.


Seems to me that you set clear "if I get a token I will gift skin". Like you said, you didn't get a token because you can't get them from ARAM or RGM no matter how well you do. 
**So effectively the agreement is voided. **
Riot can't get involved with transactions that happen outside of game as it turns into a whole mess of "he said, she said" and nothing gets resolved anyway.

> Advice for solving the matter: 

> * ignore/block friend
* Ignore/block club
* Eat a cinnamon roll (pref with tea)

Might be late but...

DELETE THOSE FRIENDS, LEGIT IF YOU KNOW THEM PERSONALLY FACE TO FACE THEN I GUESS IT MAY BE FINE 

THROUGHOUT MY WHOLE LEAGUE LIFE I'VE NOT SEEN HOW YOU GET BAN FOR FALSE GIFTING, WHICH IS EXTREMELY STUPID BECAUSE THERE IS NO TRANSACTION DONE.

**I wouldn't really made a deal since I have a fear of losing in a gamble that may or may not be in my favour, if you need a good friend or a stranger that is not them then feel free to add me since I don't ask for people to gift me.
**
As long as your not trading/selling accounts or boosting of some sort then your within the green zone.

1. You don't even know what blackmail is;
2. 

>[5:36PM]  _name removed_: u gonna gift  _name removed_ yet
he emailed riot and they said u could get temp banned for false gifting
or somting

I am 101% sure you didn't even ask for genuine screenshot where someone from riot stated that, because it's not true, you can't "fake gift".

P.S. Prepare uranus for SJW's "OMG NAMING AND SHAMING HEHE REPORTED XD HAVE FUN WITH REMOVED POST"

>P.S. Prepare uranus for SJW's "OMG NAMING AND SHAMING HEHE REPORTED XD HAVE FUN WITH REMOVED POST"

It's really simple, just don't name and shame.

Like it doesn't even make sense that people come to boards to complain, instead of making a support ticket.

Lets complain to people who play league, instead of you know, the people who run league.

It's the same as complaining to other customers about bad service, instead of just complaining to a manager who will likely actually do something.

Plus after the 50+ times you read this, you just get sick of telling people to make a support ticket, and it's easier to just repeat the no name and shame part.
I suggest you remove the names because it violates the rules. I suggest you send riot a screenshot of the conversation as it can be reported as Harassment.

People can't "add" you without you accepting.
And you can remove and/or block them at a whim.
What's the problem here? I don't see one.

Also, please explain "blackmailing" in this instance? I don't understand, you have no obligation to interact with these players at all.
Block them, ignore them. If it went down how you said you've got nothing to worry about.
